result.execSummary:
Dana M SCATTURO was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Dana M SCATTURO was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dana M SCATTURO

defendant.name: SCATTURO, Dana M
defendant.address: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
The defendant wishes to waiver her extradition to the State of Illinois.
The Court explains to the defendant her rights and finds that she has freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived them.
The defendant signs all copies of the waiver of extradition.
The Court signs all copies of the waiver of extradition.
(copies provided to DA, Jail, State of Illinois, Attorney Lambrecht, defendant and Governor)
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Attorney Vendetti informs the court that they still have not received the Governors warrant from Illinois.  The 30 day time period is set for expire on Friday.
The Court resets this matter to 03-20-15 at 10:00 a.m.
Bail is continued.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant is contesting the extradition and is requesting a governor's warrant.  Court sets bail at $5,000.00 cash on the Case File 12 CF 108 out of Pike County, Illinois and for $1,000.00 cash on the Case File 11 CF 949 with the condition that defendant must report daily to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department by 6:00 p.m.  
Review date is set for 03-17-15 at 11:30 a.m.   
Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.   Copy filed.   
Minutes.
